marklogic.body: Â This recipe is very similar to one I've been using and on for a few years, when things get tight, that can be found here:Â http://www.thefamilyhomestead.com/laundrysoap.htmÂ You can use Fels Naptha, Zote, or Ivory, or your own homemade soap, so I imagine whatever soap you've been using for bathing would probably work in this recipe pretty well.Â I use a whisk while melting the shredded soap into the Heated mixture, and find that cuts down on the size of the gel 'clumps' that form (and are normal), which is why you need to shake before use.Â HTH!
